author: cnbc.com
title: Investar Holding Corporation Declares Cash Dividend
text:
BATON ROUGE, La., March 28, 2018 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Investar Holding Corporation (“Investar”) (Nasdaq:ISTR), the holding company of Investar Bank, declared a quarterly cash dividend of $0.035 per share to holders of Investar Holding Corporation common stock. The dividend is payable on April 30, 2018 to shareholders of record as of April 9, 2018. This represents an 11% increase in the dividend per share compared to the prior quarter and is the 18th quarterly dividend paid by Investar Holding Corporation, which follows an uninterrupted 11 quarterly cash dividends paid by Investar Bank.
About Investar
Investar Holding Corporation, headquartered in Baton Rouge, Louisiana, provides full banking services, excluding trust services, through its wholly-owned banking subsidiary, Investar Bank, a Louisiana-chartered bank. The Bank had total assets of approximately $1.6 billion as of December 31, 2017. Investar Bank currently operates 20 branches serving southeast Louisiana.
